info.name: plug.dj - Special interface for Joy-
info.description: A special interface made for plug.dj user -Joy-
info.additionalInfo: A rehash and moderate edit of special interface for ObliviousPirate, also including add-ins from the following styles; Fancy DJ and vote buttons Fancy glowing XP bar Color-coded user actions (partial) Subsequent releases will only be for other colour tweaks I lied. :D
